raw_body: Beloved wife of late L.A.D.R. Jayasekara (Retired Education Officer), loving mother of Manoranjanie (Retired from CEA), Manoraj (Australia), mother-in-law of Gamini (Union Chemicals Lanka PLC) and Mala (Australia), loving grandmother of Deshani, Jayani, Mudith and Kasuni. Her remains will be at the Restpect, Borella (Jayarathna) on Monday 8.30 to 4.00 p.m. Cremation will be held at General Cemetery, Borella (new crematorium) on Monday, March 25th
